summary: This memorandum discusses the ramifications of a confrontation with the New York FBI office regarding Herbert Itkin and seeks additional information on Thomas L. Roberts and Robert Delson. It covers Roberts' affiliations with the FBI, CIA, and Itkin, including his operational use by the CIA and his contacts with Itkin in Geneva. The memo also addresses potential legal issues for Roberts and Delson, including possible prosecution and concerns about their affiliations.
title: Herbert Itkin
sender: John K. Greaney, Assistant General Counsel
